title: The Solution to an Unsightly View? Good Design
text:
A Belgian couple, ready to build a starter home in a village setting, found a promising lot in a meadow near Leuven, Belgium’s medieval university town east of Brussels. It offered green views, southern exposures and easy access to the Belgian capital, but came with a potential deal breaker—an unsightly trucking company right next door.

Other buyers in search of country living might have balked, but Hans Van Roie and Evi Reynaert, now both 35 years old, jumped at the chance. At $220,000 for a 2/3-acre lot, the price was right,...
description: An unwelcome sight on a neighboring lot didn’t stop this Belgian couple from building a 6,900-square-foot villa just east of Brussels.
